title: Why Cass' first chroma variations were better
body:
FIRST :
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wuz44csggnA/VbgSOR3sjfI/AAAAAAAAue0/2aI2LGGigAU/s1600/cass3way.jpg

NEW:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJT4t1CRj14/VbrSYjh6W2I/AAAAAAAAFdo/CXVCfKQvy0A/s1600/cass3way.jpg

The old variations were the first released onto the PBE, but due to apparent community feedback (people thought they sucked), so Riot changed them.

When I saw this chroma pack I was determined that I was gonna buy it at some point because I thought it was gorgeous, but now I don't even want to bother with them.

Lets start with the first one, or the "orange" one, I don't mind the change to this one that much but I think the first one was a lot better. The first variation was better because it had a "desert", "dry" kind of feel to it, as opposed to the new one which is just "orange". Sure you can argue that she looks like a "fire-snake" but Cass is not a fire-snake nor does she have fire-powers, she has poison powers, so it does not fit. Cass' home is Shurima, the DESERT, (edit : apparently its not her home but she still has affiliations with the desert.) which is what this chroma gives off.

The second one, or the "blue" one, I think the change completely ruined this chroma, it doesn't fit the chroma theme (curse) NOR does it fit Cass, Cass doesn't need bright colors, they don't they fit her base. The old palette for this chroma was absolutely gorgeous and complex in a good way, only to be replaced with a generic blue color scheme. Plus her arm bands are orange....WHY are they orange?

And lastly the black one, I don't mind the change to the black one because it pretty much stayed the same, but I still prefer the old one.

I don't know why everyone seemed to have a problem with these chromas, but the "dulled" colors fit Cass AND the theme of the chroma pack more, plus they looked gorgeous. It's called "CURSE." That's why her skin was so pale, she's apparently cursed. (Everyone was complaining that her skin was too pale which is probably what resulted in the skin tone change in the blue.) The bright colors frankly don't fit Cass and the new variations don't even fit the theme of the chroma pack anymore.

The old ones had gorgeous, stone-like, ancient palletes, that fit the whole curse theme AND Cass only to be replaced by generic "orange" and "blue".
